        Parameters:

      • addKeyword

        public void addKeyword(Keyword k,
              boolean commitDatabase)
        Add a Keyword We can specifie if we want the method to commit the database. Maybe we don't want to do this for a single Keyword, because it took some time to commit. But it is better to use the addKeywords-Method to add multiple Keywords. When we can't do this, then use this method with set commitDatabase to false and use then the saveKeywords-Method or commit the databse by DB.commit(DB.DB_KEYWORDS)
        Parameters:
        k - Keyword
        commitDatabase - Commit Database

      • saveKeywords

        public void saveKeywords()
        Save Keywords to the database This method does commit the database
